name: SpaceBarQuest
description:
A Typing game about trying to save a bar from crushing debt over the course of 5 increasingly difficult days.

Do you have what it takes to save nokunts space bar & grill?

Music sourced from: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Phillip_Gross/vis--vis/
Abduction_2002.ttf: Jakob Fischer at www.pizzadude.dk
